description: Shouji An is the real life player behind Tsukasa. She is actually female. An was raised by her father after the death of her mother, and was physically and mentally abused by him. His abusive behavior also distanced her from her gender: he treated her like a boy, refusing to allow her to use feminine products and basic hygiene products. There are also subtle hints that her father is an alcoholic. After awaking from her coma, Sakuma Ryo, the player behind Bear, becomes her legal guardian and allows her to go to a boarding school. She meets with Mariko, Subaru`s player, and the two begin a relationship.
name: Shouji An
